all_products_summary: Complete catalog of Cosmic Roots — a chill headshop offering incense, glassware, tapestries, and stickers. Each product is chosen with intention, sustainability, and good vibes in mind.

incense.description: Hand-rolled incense from artisans around the world. Each stick is a journey, a ritual, a moment to breathe.
incense.vibe: These aren't just scents — they're portals to different states of mind.

glassware.description: Functional art, hand-blown by skilled glassworkers. Each piece is unique, beautiful, and made to last.
glassware.vibe: These aren't mass-produced. Every swirl, every color shift, every slight variation — that's the human hand at work.

tapestries.description: Wall hangings that transform spaces and shift energy. Each one is a portal to somewhere else.
tapestries.vibe: Tapestries aren't just decoration — they're instant atmosphere.

stickers.description: Vinyl stickers for laptops, water bottles, and anywhere else you want to express yourself.
stickers.vibe: Stickers are tiny declarations of identity. Each one is a little piece of who you are.
